titles.title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to clarify the definition of a deposit broker, and for other purposes.
To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to clarify the definition of a deposit broker, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill excludes certain affiliated broker-dealers that service retirement accounts and other similar plans from requirements applicable to brokered deposits.
